examples.customer_message: How do I reset my password?
examples.sample_response: I can help with that! Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link. The link is valid for 24 hours. Let me know if you need anything else!
examples.explanation: Straightforward question with high-confidence KB match. Agent responds directly.

examples.customer_message: I'm REALLY frustrated! My payment isn't going through and I need access NOW!
examples.explanation: High frustration detected (caps, exclamation, urgency words). Agent escalates immediately regardless of KB match.

examples.customer_message: Can you help me export my data?
examples.sample_response: I can help with that! Navigate to Settings > Data & Privacy > Export Data. Select the data you want to export and click 'Start Export'. You'll receive an email when your export is ready. Let me know if you need anything else!
examples.explanation: Clear intent match to knowledge base article. Agent provides step-by-step instructions.
Vague question doesn't match KB well. Agent recognizes uncertainty and escalates to ensure customer gets accurate help.

examples.customer_message: Thanks for your help earlier, one more question - how do I update my credit card?
examples.sample_response: I can help with that! You can update your payment method by going to Settings > Billing > Payment Methods. Click 'Add Payment Method' and follow the prompts. Let me know if you need anything else!
examples.explanation: Positive sentiment + clear billing question. Agent maintains friendly tone and provides direct answer.

metrics.note: These are typical ranges for a well-configured customer support agent. Your results may vary based on knowledge base quality and escalation threshold settings.
